did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two articles by Osmundson published in LANDSCAPE ARCHITECTURE magazine.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, Golden Gate Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two articles by Osmundson published in LANDSCAPE ARCHITECTURE magazine: "Engineers Relax Controls to Get a Living Levee," November 1980; and "The Changing Technique of Roof Garden Design," September 1979.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Lambda Alpha International. Golden Gate Chapter.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Theodore Ole Osmundson Papers, #3597. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Part of Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.
